0: This was recently my 3rd trip to the SLS venue in the past 3 months and it shal not be my last
I booked SLS for three nights while attending the KBIS IBS show at the Convention Center
Already Tired I stayed at the SLS Las Vegas for a work event
Since it was going to be fight weekend Mayweather vs Pacquiao we knew it was going to be extremely busy weekend in Vegas so driving to and from events all weekend was not an option

No Windows Natural LightingCarpet seemed dirtyVery SmalConcierge was not very informative My boyfriend booked this room on hotwirecom for 60 a night for a tournament at the Las Vegas convention center he was playing in for the weekend
I like the functions on smart TVs but they do not let you access them
Apparently you get tickets to these events through local radio stations which really does not work for out of town guests
They have two pools at this property one is the Lux pool which was closed over the weekend for an event
Ran the Rock n Roll 12 marathon event even though this hotel was farther north it was convenient to be first on the monorail heading to the central strip especially on event day
I could hop on the train and go to hotel change and be back in 20 25 minutes at the convention center
1: It is very close to the convention center so it was perfect for me
The hotel is very close to the Las Vegas Convention Center
Loved it is location which is near the Stratosphere and the Conference Center
Great hotel close to convention centre
I took part in an international conference which afforded me the use of a ballroom and a visit to an on site restaurant
Great value if you are in town for a convention
We love that we can walk to convention center
Room was big comfortable close to Monorail Convention Center
Location was near the convention center
The restaurants were very good and had venues for many price points
